lyrics.stanza: I am crucified with Christ And it is no longer I who liveth, But it is Christ who lives in me; And the life which I now live In the flesh, I live in faith— The faith in the Son of God Who loved and gave Himself up for me.

And now I'm walking by the Spirit Step by step, day by day, O Lord, I love You. You're the precious One to me. As I do this and that Lord, remind me where You're at; You're in my spirit, Dispensing grace to me.

And now I'm walking by the Spirit, Marching on toward the goal. O Lord, Your purpose Means everything to me. All self-love I lay aside For the churches, for Your Bride, For the fulfillment Of Your economy.
